data.strFullDescription: [p]"Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a sealed-off future Tokyo, where you compete for the fastest speed in your customized cars on the highways that weave through the city, aiming to reach the top.[/p][p]Drive real cars on meticulously recreated courses, compete against powerful rivals,[/p][p]slip through other cars, and engage in spirit-wracking battles.[/p][p]This is a series with unparalleled appeal.[/p][p][/p][list][*][p]What is SP Battle (Spirit Point Battle)[/p][/*][/list][p]Unlike regular racing games,[/p][p]the SP Battle is a unique battle feature based Spirit Points, a numeric value that quantifies the willpower of drivers.[/p][p]Not only is your speed tested, master the mind games and break your opponent's resolve.[/p][p][/p][list][*][p]Blaze through the midnight Shuto Expressway[/p][/*][/list][p]With the Tokyo Expressway faithfully reproduced, the complex twists and dramatic elevation changes deliver an adrenaline-pumping racing experience that's as close to the real thing as it gets.[/p][p][/p][list][*][p]Countless rivals with mysterious charm[/p][/*][/list][p]The race begins with a headlight flash as you face off against rivals with distinctive cars and bold driving styles.[/p]
data.strSnippet: "Tokyo Xtreme Racer" is a racing game set in a blocked-off future Tokyo, where players aim to be the fastest by driving their best cars on the highways that weave through the city.
